news.title: 法国在地中海扣押疑似俄罗斯“影子舰队”油轮
news.title0: France seizes suspected Russian 'shadow fleet' oil tanker in the Mediterranean
news.content: 法国海军在盟友协助下，于地中海扣押一艘涉嫌违反制裁、为俄罗斯运输石油的油轮，旨在切断俄战争资金来源。
news.content0: France says it has seized an oil tanker in the Mediterranean suspected of being part of Russia's sanction-busting "shadow fleet".French President Emmanuel Macron said the tanker, named the Grinch, was "subject to international sanctions and suspected of flying a false flag".The French navy, with the assistance of allies including the UK, boarded the vessel on Thursday morning between Spain and Morocco. French maritime authorities said that a search of the vessel had "confirmed the doubts as to the regularity of the flag".Russia's embassy in Paris said it had not been informed of the seizure.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 特朗普起诉摩根大通索赔50亿美元
news.title0: Trump sues JPMorgan for $5bn over account closure after Capitol riot
news.content: 特朗普指控摩根大通因其政治观点非法关闭其账户，造成重大财务与声誉损失，索赔50亿美元。
news.content0: President Donald Trump has filed a $5bn (£3.7bn) lawsuit against America's biggest bank JPMorgan Chase, accusing it of illegally closing his accounts for political reasons.The lawsuit, which also names the bank's chief executive Jamie Dimon, alleges that Trump and his businesses suffered "considerable financial and reputational harm" after the bank abruptly closed their accounts in 2021.The bank moved to close the accounts after the 6 January, 2021 riot when Trump supporters descended on the US Capitol to disrupt formal ratification of the election results.A JPMorgan Chase spokesperson said "the suit has no merit"."  "JPMC does not close accounts for political or religious reasons."
news.author: BBC

news.title: 美国移民执法拘留五岁男童引争议
news.title0: ICE detains 5-year-old and father in Minnesota, lawyer says
news.content: 美国移民海关执法局在明尼苏达州执法行动中拘留一名五岁男童及其父亲，校方质疑为何针对儿童。
news.content0: US Immigration and Customs Enforcement (ICE) officers detained a 5-year-old boy on Tuesday during an immigration enforcement operation, Minnesota school officials and the family's lawyer have said.Pre-schooler Liam Ramos was with his father - named by the Department of Homeland Security (DHS) as Adrian Alexander Conejo Arias - when Conejo Arias was approached by agents on his driveway.Ina statement posted on X, the DHS said "ICE did NOT target a child", but was conducting an operation against his father, an "illegal alien" who "abandoned" his son when approached.Zena Stenvik, the Columbia Heights Public Schools superintendent, asked: "Why detain a 5-year-old?
news.author: BBC

news.title: 2026年奥斯卡提名名单公布
news.content: 好莱坞公布第98届奥斯卡金像奖提名名单，《罪人》以创纪录的16项提名领跑。颁奖典礼将于3月15日举行。
news.content0: Hollywood has revealed the nominations for this year's Oscars, which will honour the film industry's finest stars and movies from the past 12 months.Sinners leads the way with a record 16 nominations, breaking the record for the most Oscar nominations, which was previously held by All About Eve (1950), Titanic (1997) and La La Land (2016).One Battle After Another is next with 13 nominations, while Marty Supreme, Frankenstein and Sentimental Value are next with nine, and Hamnet has eight.The awards will take place on 15 March, hosted by US comedian Conan O'Brien.
news.author: BBC

news.title: 智利野火致19人死亡，高温加剧火情
news.title0: Chile wildfires leave 19 dead amid extreme heat as scores evacuated
news.content: 智利多地爆发野火，已造成至少19人死亡，当局展开大规模疏散，高温大风加剧了火势。
news.content0: Wildfires in Chile have left at least 19 people dead, authorities said Monday, as the government carried out mass evacuations and fought nearly two dozen blazes exacerbated by intense heat and high winds.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 韩国前总理因戒严案被判23年监禁
news.title0: South Korea’s former leader jailed for 23 years in martial law case
news.content: 韩国法院裁定前总理韩悳洙参与前总统尹锡悦实施的戒严构成叛乱罪，判处其23年有期徒刑。
news.content0: South Korean court ruled Wednesday that the ill-fated imposition of martial law by the then President Yoon Suk Yeol constituted an act of rebellion, as it sentenced his prime minister to 23 years in prison for his involvement.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 美国将迎历史性冬季风暴，半数地区受影响
news.title0: Potentially historic winter storm to slam much of the US with destructive ice and heavy snow
news.content: 一场历史性冬季风暴将袭击美国超过一半地区，带来破坏性冰灾和大量降雪，影响从得州到东北部的广阔区域。
news.content0: More than half of the United States is about to face one of the most sprawling and menacing winter storms in years, one that threatens to deliver a potentially historic blow of snow and ice.
news.author: CNN

news.title: 西班牙通勤列车撞上起重机，五日四起事故
news.title0: Commuter train crashes into crane in Murcia, marking Spain's fourth train crash in five days
news.content: 西班牙穆尔西亚一列通勤列车撞上施工起重机，造成四人轻伤，这是该国五天内发生的第四起铁路事故。
news.content0: A commuter train has crashed into a construction crane in southeastern Spain, the fourth rail incident in the space of a week.
news.author: Sky News

news.title: 威尔士瀑布景点18个月内三人死亡，安全警告发布
news.title0: Warning issued after three deaths in 18 months at popular waterfall spot in Wales
news.content: 威尔士一热门瀑布景点在18个月内发生三起溺亡事件，验尸官对信号缺失和标识不清表示担忧，呼吁加强安全措施。
news.content0: The death of three people at a waterfall spot in Wales over an 18-month period has prompted a warning about the safety of the popular location.
news.author: Sky News
